actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for participation in street gangs and to provide additional penalties for felonies in furtherance of the activities of such gangs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Criminal Street Gang Enforcement Act of 1990

summary.text: Criminal Street Gang Enforcement Act of 1990 - Amends the Federal criminal code to establish penalties for participating in a street gang with knowledge that its members engage in a pattern of criminal gang activity. Establishes penalties, in addition to the punishment otherwise provided by law, for the commission of a felony crime of violence for any criminal street gang. Provides that juvenile gang violent offenders may be tried as adults.

titles.title: Criminal Street Gang Enforcement Act of 1990

To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for participation in street gangs and to provide additional penalties for felonies in furtherance of the activities of such gangs, and for other purposes.
